Articles.Content:
This ad brings back so many memories. I would literally turn on the Discovery Channel just to see it.

Now that I found it again it\'s like a massive blast from the past, right into my face.

Discuss the AWESOMENESS of this.

Now that\'s stuck in my head. :C

Tiem to flush it out with hours of Rise of Nations music.
NO DON\'T FLUSH IT OUT IT IS GOOD IT LOVES YOU

Boom de ya ta (Stephen Hawking voice). Always makes me laugh.

We have an awesome world, and I wish they still played this commercial.
Youtube Poop version of this song =P

Man, we have to make a KSP version of this

I love the mountains, I love the clear black sky

I love big boosters, I love when rockets fly

I love the whole world, and all it\'s sights and sounds

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada

I love the ocean, I love real shiny things,

I love to go fast, I love exploding things

I love the whole world, and all it\'s craziness

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada

I love the radar, I love the stars that shine

I love the way we come back every time

I love the whole world, it\'s such a brilliant place

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada...

Man, we have to make a KSP version of this

I love the mountains, I love the clear black sky

I love big boosters, I love when rockets fly

I love the whole world, and all it\'s sights and sounds

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada

I love the ocean, I love real shiny things,

I love to go fast, I love exploding things

I love the whole world, and all it\'s craziness

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada

I love the radar, I love the stars that shine

I love the way we come back every time

I love the whole world, it\'s such a brilliant place

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada...

That was really nice pants! I wonder if any more things from KSP could be put in.
I remember this! Adam got me every time. ;P

Aww, thanks OD!

TBH if I added any more things it would seem unnatural, We could extend it though, like add another verse in to avoid clutter.

I love the engines, I love the winglets too

I love the Mun, I love the stupid crew

I love all Space flight, the way things feel alright

Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada Boomdeyada
